messages.message:
@lydia @Kerry - For this customer, waiting for a model change for larger context window (likely in 24.04 release at the earliest) will not be an option, as we want to close the free trial evaluation asap.

Let me know if we can get the desired schema (shared above) using a UDF instead. Happy to share the project creds via DM if anybody on the team wants to see the customer samples.

This is unfortunate a timing problem -- we don't yet know if things getting trimmed happen during table extraction or during clean (or they do both using the same prompt). Regardless --
• TDF will GA in 24.02 that enables us to extract tables without the limitations of model context window. 
• UDF will GA in 24.04 that can also enable reshaping / formatting out of context stuff 
• Further, we can swap to use gpt3.5-16k in 24.04 or later; that might help too  
These can't help them _right now_ :confused: I can brainstorm options with you @Varun Jain offline.

@Varun Jain I took a look at your Zoom recording, and one of the paystubs format is ADP, which I think is pretty standard. Can you give us access to the project, or copy-paste the prompts here, so we can try to recreate what the customer is trying to extract?
Sharing the project creds via DM with you @lydia - I’m also chatting with @Serena tomorrow to discuss cases where we face extraction issues, and can give her a walkthrough of the Ocrolus example.
